mapper.select: select * from (select m.*, p.url from member m left join profile p on m.id = p.id where m.id=#{ID} order by regdate desc ) where rownum=1
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender=#{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age=#{age, jdbcType=NUMERIC} where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update member set password=#{password} where email=#{idmail}
mapper.delete: delete FROM member WHERE id in (#{id})
